publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-54 Gil Paterson: Local Delivery of Health Service—That the Parliament congratulates and supports the Scottish Executive for its commitment to health services being delivered at a local level; calls on the Executive urgently to review any plans to reduce the delivery of health services at a local level, and further calls on the Greater Glasgow and Clyde NHS Board to reconsider any further plans to reduce or remove services from the Vale of Leven Hospital.
S3M-54 Local Delivery of Health Service (lodged on 22 May 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*

S3M-54 Gil Paterson: Local Delivery of Health Service—That the Parliament congratulates and supports the Scottish Executive for its commitment to health services being delivered at a local level; calls on the Executive urgently to review any plans to reduce the delivery of health services at a local level, and further calls on the Greater Glasgow and Clyde NHS Board to reconsider any further plans to reduce or remove services from the Vale of Leven Hospital. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris, Michael Matheson*
S3M-54 Local Delivery of Health Service (lodged on 22 May 2007) Sandra White*
S3M-54 Local Delivery of Health Service (lodged on 22 May 2007) Stuart McMillan*

S3M-54 Local Delivery of Health Service (lodged on 22 May 2007) Bashir Ahmad*, Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Dave Thompson*, Christina McKelvie*, Jackson Carlaw*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Alex Neil*
S3M-54 Local Delivery of Health Service (lodged on 22 May 2007) Bill Wilson*
S3M-54 Local Delivery of Health Service (lodged on 22 May 2007) Bill Kidd*
S3M-54 Local Delivery of Health Service (lodged on 22 May 2007) Angela Constance* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
